resources.string: You are not connected to the internet. Please check your connection.
Limit of queries in the Wolfram API

The Wolfram API limits the number of queries per application to 2000 per month. This means that the users of ”Formula Que” altogether just have 2000 queries per month! Unfortunately, right now, those queries are used up. 

Since ”Formula Que” is a non-profit, open source project that aims at education, it would be great if Wolfram Alpha increased (or better removed) the limit of queries per month. 

Until then, please vist Wolfram Alpha's webpage directly.
